What is Micronaut?

  • JVM framework for building scalable, performant microservices
  • Using Java, Groovy or Kotlin
  • An efficient compile-time dependency-injection container
  • A reactive HTTP server & client based on Netty
  • A suite of cloud-native features
  • Apache License v2

Who made Micronaut?

  • From creators of Grails
  • Sponsored by OCI

How to develop with Micronaut?

More Micronaut?

  • Distributed configuration
  • Serverless functions
  • Message driven microservices with Kafka
  • Command line applications with Picocli

More Micronaut?

  • Micronaut for Spring
  • https://micronaut.io
